sentences.en: A badly sunburned face or back is extremely painful.
sentences.cn: 严重的脸部或背部晒伤会非常疼痛。

sentences.en: Administer the salve to the sunburned area with a cotton swab.
sentences.cn: 请用棉药签把药膏敷在晒伤的地方.

sentences.en: But the arms were sunburned, too.
sentences.cn: 但是他的胳膊也是晒黑了的.

sentences.en: Did you know that pigs can get sunburned?
sentences.cn: 你可知道猪也可能得日晒斑的 呢 .

sentences.en: He is sunburned from a day on the beach.
sentences.cn: 在海边过了一天,他被晒黑了.

sentences.en: Her face is always sunburned and very well made up.
sentences.cn: 她永远有一张晒黑的脸,但化妆总是恰到好处.

sentences.en: His face was a sunburned mixture of sea, mountains and seaweed.
sentences.cn: 他晒黑的面孔呈现出一种海洋 、 高山和海藻的混合特征.

sentences.en: I am really sunburned. My skin'll start to peel soon.
sentences.cn: 我晒得过度了,皮肤不久会脱皮.

sentences.en: I was 13, sunburned, shaggy - haired, a little aloof, and solitary.
sentences.cn: 我才十三岁, 皮肤黧黑,头发凌乱, 有点儿孤芳自赏, 也不免形单影只.

sentences.en: Sunscreen. Prevents and heals dry, chapped and sunburned lips.
sentences.cn: 防晒. 滋润保护双唇,愈合皲裂 、 舒缓晒伤. (编者译,仅供参考)

sentences.en: The old man looked at him with his sunburned, confident loving eyes.
sentences.cn: 老儿用他那双日晒风吹的,坚定的 、 慈爱的眼睛望着他.

sentences.en: We were all sunburned from a day on the beach.
sentences.cn: 我们在海滩上过了一天,皮肤都晒黑了.

sentences.en: Yesterday, when I was swimming I got sunburned.
sentences.cn: 我昨天游泳的时候晒伤了.

words.tran_cn: 晒黑的；有晒斑的；日炙的
晒黑（sunburn的过去式和过去分词）
晒伤皮肤；晒红皮肤；晒黑皮肤

trans.tran_en: having a red and painful skin as a result of spending too much time in the sun
